name: medtracker-be
description: Backend API for Medicine Tracker app - handles authentication, medicine management, intake logging, and weight tracking

scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment check:', { SUPABASE_URL: process.env.SUPABASE_URL ? 'Set' : 'Missing', SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Missing' })"

author: Medicine Tracker Team
